properties.headline: NSW Health Vaccination Centre - SYDNEY OLYMPIC PARK Figtree Drive at Australia Avenue
properties.publicTransport: Plan your trip by public transport at transportnsw.info.

arrangementAttachments.displayName: Sydney Olympic Park NSW Health Vaccination Centres – transport and parking map
arrangementAttachments.linkName: Sydney Olympic Park NSW Health Vaccination Centres – transport and parking map

properties.otherAdvice:
The NSW Health Vaccination Centre in Sydney Olympic Park is located at 1 Figtree Drive. The centre is in operation for those with confirmed appointments only from 8am to 7pm, Monday to Saturday. 

Free parking is available at P3 car park on Sarah Durack Ave for those with vaccination appointments. Follow the signs to navigate the short walk to the centre, alternatively a shuttle bus will run to the centre approximately every 20 minutes.

Allow additional travel time on roads approaching the precinct including Australia Ave, Underwood Rd and Hill Rd, and follow the directions of traffic control and staff on site.

For more information about the COVID-19 Vaccination Program in NSW or to check your eligibility and make a booking, visit the NSW Health website at health.nsw.gov.au/COVID-19.

properties.headline: NSW Health Vaccination Centre - BELMONT Pacific Highway near Floraville Road, Floraville
properties.publicTransport: Plan your trip by public transport at transportnsw.info.
properties.otherAdvice:
The NSW Health Vaccination Centre in Belmont is located at the former Bunnings site at 393 Pacific Hwy. The centre is in operation for those with confirmed appointments only from 8am to 6pm daily Monday to Friday, and from 8:30am to 3pm on Saturday and Sunday. 

Allow additional travel time on roads approaching the precinct particularly during the morning and evening peak. 

For more information about the COVID-19 Vaccination Program in NSW or to check your eligibility and make a booking, visit the NSW Health website at health.nsw.gov.au/COVID-19.

properties.headline: NSW Health Vaccination Centre - SYDNEY CBD Pitt Street at King Street, Sydney
properties.publicTransport: Plan your trip by public transport at transportnsw.info.
properties.otherAdvice:
The NSW Health Vaccination Centre in the Sydney CBD is located at 175 Pitt St and is in operation for those with confirmed appointments only from 8am to 8pm on Monday to Friday, and from 8am to 4pm on Saturday and Sunday. 

Allow additional travel time on roads approaching the precinct particularly during the morning and evening peak. 

For more information about the COVID-19 Vaccination Program in NSW or to check your eligibility and make a booking, visit the NSW Health website at health.nsw.gov.au/COVID-19.

properties.headline: NSW Health Vaccination Centre - MACQUARIE FIELDS Victoria Road at Brooks Street
properties.publicTransport: Plan your trip by public transport at transportnsw.info.

arrangementAttachments.displayName: Macquarie Fields NSW Health Vaccination Centre - transport and parking map
arrangementAttachments.linkName: Macquarie Fields NSW Health Vaccination Centre - transport and parking map

properties.otherAdvice:
The NSW Health Vaccination Centre in Macquarie Fields is located at Glenquarie Town Centre. The centre is in operation for those with confirmed appointments only from 7:30am to 6:45pm daily Monday to Sunday. Parking is available at James Meehan Oval, access via Parliament Road

Allow additional travel time on roads approaching the precinct including Victoria Rd, Canterbury Rd and Harold St, particularly during the morning and evening peak periods.

For more information about the COVID-19 Vaccination Program in NSW or to check your eligibility and make a booking, visit the NSW Health website at health.nsw.gov.au/COVID-19.

properties.headline: NSW Health Vaccination Centre - WOLLONGONG Crown Street at Church Street
properties.publicTransport: Plan your trip by public transport at transportnsw.info.
properties.otherAdvice:
The NSW Health Vaccination Centre in Wollongong is located at 163-177 Crown Street. The centre is in operation for those with confirmed appointments only from 8am to 4:30pm daily, Monday to Sunday.

Allow additional travel time on roads approaching the centre including Crown St, Keira St, Church St and Burelli St, particularly during the morning and evening peak periods.

For more information about the COVID-19 Vaccination Program in NSW or to check your eligibility and make a booking, visit the NSW Health website at health.nsw.gov.au/COVID-19.

properties.headline: Qudos Bank Arena NSW Health Vaccination Centre - SYDNEY OLYMPIC PARK Edwin Flack Avenue at Olympic Boulevard
properties.publicTransport: Plan your trip by public transport at transportnsw.info.

arrangementAttachments.displayName: Sydney Olympic Park NSW Health Vaccination Centres – transport and parking map
arrangementAttachments.linkName: Sydney Olympic Park NSW Health Vaccination Centres – transport and parking map

properties.otherAdvice:
The NSW Health Vaccination Centre is open at Qudos Bank Arena in Sydney Olympic Park from 7am to 11pm Monday to Sunday for those with registered vaccination bookings.

Free parking is available at P1 car park on Edwin Flack Ave for those with vaccination appointments, entry via Old Hill Link.

Olympic Blvd is closed between Dawn Fraser Ave and Edwin Flack Ave while the centre is in operation.

An accessible pick up & drop off zone is available on Olympic Blvd near Edwin Flack Ave, traffic controllers will manage access on site. 

Allow additional travel time on roads approaching and within the precinct including Edwin Flack Ave and Hill Rd, and follow the directions of traffic controllers and staff.

For more information about the COVID-19 Vaccination Program in NSW or to check your eligibility and make a booking, visit the NSW Health website at health.nsw.gov.au/COVID-19.
properties.displayName: Qudos Bank Arena NSW Health Vaccination Centre

properties.headline: Bicentennial Park NSW Health Vaccination Centre - SYDNEY OLYMPIC PARK Bicentennial Drive at Australia Avenue
properties.publicTransport: Plan your trip by public transport at transportnsw.info.
properties.otherAdvice:
The NSW Health Vaccination Centre is open at Waterview in Bicentennial Park, Sydney Olympic Park from 7:30am to 5:30pm Monday to Sunday for those with registered vaccination bookings.

The closest car park is in Bicentennial Park entry via left turn only from Australia Ave. Note: there is no right turn from Australia Ave into Bicentennial Park. If you are travelling by car it is recommended that you enter Sydney Olympic Park via Hill Road, Silverwater Road or Birnie Avenue.

Allow additional travel time on roads approaching and within the precinct including Australia Ave, Sarah Durack Ave, Bennelong Pwky, Edwin Flack Ave and Hill Rd, and follow the directions of traffic controllers and staff.

For more information about the COVID-19 Vaccination Program in NSW or to check your eligibility and make a booking, visit the NSW Health website at health.nsw.gov.au/COVID-19.
properties.displayName: Bicentennial Park NSW Health Vaccination Centre

properties.headline: Randwick Races - Saturday 16 October - RANDWICK Anzac Parade, Alison Road, High Street approaching Royal Randwick Racecourse
properties.publicTransport: Visit transportnsw.info to plan your trip.
properties.otherAdvice:
Everest Race Day at Royal Randwick Racecourse. First race from 12:30pm. 

Traffic may be heavier than usual on Anzac Pde, Doncaster Ave, High St, Alison Rd and Darley Rd as event goers travel to and from the races. Motorists should allow extra travel time and be aware of increased pedestrian activity on local roads.

Special event clearways will be in effect on the following roads around Randwick Racecourse:     

  • From 8am to 7pm on Ascot St between Doncaster Ave and the roundabout at the racecourse (both sides) 
  • From 3pm to 7pm on High St between the entry to the racecourse and Anzac Pde (southern side)
  • From 4am to 7pm on Darley Rd between Alison Rd and Centennial Park roundabout (western side)

Clearways are strict no-parking zones, and apply even to local residents or Mobility Scheme Permit holders. Check signs before parking as vehicles left in special event clearways will be towed and a towing fee applies.

roads.mainStreet: Anzac Parade, Alison Road, High Street

properties.headline: Women's Football - Saturday 23 October - PARRAMATTA O'Connell Street at Victoria Road
properties.publicTransport: Visit transportnsw.info to plan your trip.
properties.otherAdvice:
Women's Football International Friendly: Matildas v Brazil at CommBank Stadium from 7:45pm until 9:30pm approx.

Traffic will be heavier than usual on roads approaching and around Parramatta CBD including O'Connell St, Parramatta Rd, Church St, Victoria Rd and James Ruse Dr as fans travel to the stadium. 

Roads outside the stadium may close at full-time to allow crowds to safely leave the precinct.

Motorists should allow extra travel time and be aware of increased pedestrian activity on roads in the area.

webLinks.linkText: NSW National Parks & Wildlife Service - Royal National Park local alerts

properties.headline: Royal National Park - ROYAL NATIONAL PARK McKell Ave, Farnell Ave and various roads at Princes Hwy
properties.adviceB: Check signage; Allow extra travel time
properties.otherAdvice:
The Royal National Park is typically very busy during the weekends.

Road closures will be implemented as precincts and car parks reach full at Wattamolla Beach, Garie Beach, Audley, Maianbar and Bundeena.

If parking capacity is reached across all precincts, traffic will only be permitted to travel through the park. If there are significant delays, both the northern and southern entries to the park via Farnell Ave at Loftus and via Lady Wakehurst Dr at Otford will close. Entry will be maintained via McKell Ave at Waterfall for residents only. 

Visitors are encouraged to check the Royal National Park local alerts before travelling for updates on precinct access. Walking trails may also be closed due to fire bans and/or risks so plan ahead. 

Road closures when precincts reach capacity:

  • Wattamolla Rd between Sir Bertram Stevens Dr and Wattamolla Beach
  • Garie Rd between Sir Bertram Stevens Dr and Garie Beach
  • Maianbar Rd between Bundeena Dr and Maianbar township
  • Bundeena Dr between Sir Bertram Stevens Dr and Bundeena township

Traffic controllers and NSW Police will be on-site managing access for local residents on Maianbar Rd and Bundeena Dr upon proof of residential address.

roads.mainStreet: McKell Ave, Farnell Ave and various roads

properties.headline: Festival - Friday 29 October to Sunday 7 November - GRAFTON Pond Street between Prince Street AND Duke Street
properties.otherAdvice:
The annual Grafton Jacaranda Festival will take place from Friday 29 October to Sunday 7 November at various venues in Grafton. 

On Thursday 4 November from 6am until 5pm Pond St between Prince St and Duke St will be closed for the annual market store day and street parade. 

Motorists should allow extra travel time throughout the duration of the festival and be aware of increased pedestrian activity, particularly over the weekends when large crowds are expected.
properties.displayName: Festival - Friday 29 October to Sunday 7 November
